In consideration of the Sponsorship Rights granted to Hydron hereunder:

                            (a) Hydron shall pay to the Dolphins an aggregate amount of $96,000 (plus any applicable sales and other taxes) as follows: Hydron shall pay Dolphins the sum of $24,000 (plus any applicable sales and other taxes) on July 1, 1997, July 1, 1998, July 1, 1999 and July 1, 2000.
perturbation.changed_text:
In consideration of the Sponsorship Rights granted to Hydron hereunder:

                            (a) Hydron shall remit to the Dolphins an aggregate amount of $96,000 (plus any applicable sales and other taxes) as follows: Hydron shall provide Dolphins the sum of $24,000 (plus any applicable sales and other taxes) on July 1, 1997, July 1, 1998, July 1, 1999 and July 1, 2000.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'pay', 'remit', and 'provide' are used interchangeably. This could cause confusion as to the exact method or form of payment required. The phrase 'pay' implies a direct transfer of funds, while 'remit' suggests sending money, possibly through a third party. The term 'provide' is even more ambiguous and doesn't clearly specify the means of transferring funds. It is uncertain which term is correct.

perturbation.original_text:
Without prejudice to any other rights, the Dolphins shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon written notice to Hydron if Hydron fails to perform or comply with any term or condition of this Agreement within five (5) business days following delivery of written notice for a payment default or within thirty (30) days following written notice of any other breach of this Agreement sent to Hydron stating such failure or failures; provided that any such failure remains uncured at the end of such period.

                            (b) Without notice to any rights, Hydron shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon written notice to Dolphins, if Dolphins fail to perform or comply with any material terms or conditions of this Agreement within thirty (30) days following delivery of written notice to Dolphins stating such failure or failures; provided that any failure remains uncured at the end of such period.
perturbation.changed_text:
Without prejudice to any other rights, the Dolphins shall have the right to cancel this Agreement upon written notification to Hydron if Hydron fails to perform or comply with any term or condition of this Agreement within five (5) business days following delivery of written advice for a payment default or within thirty (30) days following written notice of any other infraction of this Agreement sent to Hydron stating such failure or failures; provided that any such failure remains uncured at the end of such period.

                            (b) Without notice to any rights, Hydron shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon written notice to Dolphins, if Dolphins fail to perform or comply with any material terms or conditions of this Agreement within thirty (30) days following delivery of written notice to Dolphins stating such failure or failures; provided that any failure remains uncured at the end of such period.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'terminate' and 'cancel' are used interchangeably, potentially implying a difference in the process or consequences of ending the agreement. 'Notice' and 'Advice' are used interchangeably which is also confusing. Additionally, 'breach' is replaced with 'infraction', altering the severity of the violation. 'Infraction' is softer and may not trigger the same termination clauses as a 'breach'.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement (including Exhibit "A") sets forth the entire understanding and agreement of the parties hereto with respect to its subject matter and supersedes all prior under standings or agreements between the parties relating to the same subject matter. Any amendments or modifications to this Agreement shall be in writing, as mutually agreed upon by both parties.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement (including Exhibit "A") sets forth the complete understanding and deal of the parties hereto with respect to its subject matter and supersedes all prior under standings or accords between the parties relating to the same subject matter. Any amendments or revisions to this Agreement shall be in writing, as mutually agreed upon by both parties.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'understanding', 'agreement', and 'deal' are used interchangeably, when 'deal' is more informal and could suggest a less legally binding intent. 'Agreements' and 'accords' are used which are similar, but can carry different weight legally. 'Amendments' and 'revisions' are also used interchangeably, which could cause confusion as to whether a 'revision' requires the same formal process as an 'amendment'.
